<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a dummy basic block. This pass may be &quot;required&quot; by passes that cannot deal</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   AU.addRequiredID(BreakCriticalEdgesID);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (set, immediate dominators, tree, and frontier) information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PromoteMemoryToRegister - This pass is used to promote memory references to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be register references. A simple example of the transformation performed by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this pass is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        FROM CODE                           TO CODE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %X = alloca i32, i32 1                 ret i32 42</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   store i32 42, i32 &#42;%X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Y = load i32&#42; %X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ret i32 %Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpass">FunctionPass</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a18287429a6a702fe387ac86d66d3ad26">createPromoteMemoryToRegisterPass</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RegToMemWrapperPass - This pass is used to demote registers to memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// references. In basically undoes the PromoteMemoryToRegister pass to make cfg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hacking easier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopSimplify - Insert Pre-header blocks into the CFG for every function in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the module.  This pass updates dominator information, loop information, and</span></CodeLine>
